content.rendered:
Knox Artiste is a young musician brought up in Dubai and hails from the city of New Delhi.

It is very rare to see an artist emerge from nothing and gain love in the hearts of music lovers around the world. Backed with more than 16 years of experience in the field of music & entertainment, this all-in-one performer uses his technical skill as an audio engineer, his vast knowledge of trending genres and his versatile vocal abilities to create something completely fresh and original for his listeners. He has evolved from a DJ at the age of 14 into one of the most sought after and diverse musicians on YouTube today.

Producing musical tracks which showcase him as the first of his kind and highlighting his talent in Singing, Rapping, Music Composition and Production. He holds over 200 Million Organic YouTube Views on his independent YouTube Channel along with 100 Million Facebook Video Views on his official page and other associated Facebook pages.

Seeing him carry his success to the stage is a spectacle in itself. Knox has a knack of bringing something new to the table every time he hits the stage with his covers, mashups and original tracks.

Knox Artiste’s debut single ‘Botal Khol’  was released on the 1st of September, 2017 on India’s biggest music recording label ’T-Series Music’ featuring Jasmine Sandlas and has attained more than 7 million views.

He has performed alongside some of world’s biggest musical talents such as Shaggy (Angel), Yo Yo Honey Singh, Badshah, Raftaar, Arijit Singh, Manj Musik, Nindy Kaur, Jaz Dhami, Neha Kakkar & many more.

Knox has done more than a thousand shows all around the globe during his 16 year career as an Entertainer & Performer. He is a multi-lingual artist who sings in English, Punjabi & Hindi.

 

Facebook
Instagram
Youtube
Twitter
Spotify
Apple
